directions: In a medium bowl, combine the dressing ingredients, and whisk together well. Add salt and pepper to taste. You can serve the dressing immediately or you can cover it and chill for an hour.
In a large bowl, combine all of the salad ingredients, except the cashew nuts. Add the dressing to the salad and toss. Sprinkle cashew nuts on top of the salad.
ingredients: one package (10 oz) fresh spinach (about 10 cups of torn leaves)
4 cups sliced fresh strawberries (cleaned and hulled)
title: Strawberry spinach salad
